mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, username, phone, real_name, id_card, email, icon, status, gender, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select GROUP_CONCAT(r.`name`) roleList, u.id, u.tenant_id, u.username, u.phone, u.real_name, u.id_card, u.icon, u.`status`, u.email, u.gender, u.gmt_create, u.gmt_modified from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id left join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where 1 = 1
GROUP BY u.id order by u.gmt_create desc;

choose.when: and ( u.name like concat('%', #{criteria.blurry}, '%') or u.real_name like concat('%', #{criteria.blurry}, '%') or u.phone like concat('%', #{criteria.blurry}, '%') or u.id_card like concat('%', #{criteria.blurry}, '%') )
